display_information.name: Starship
display_information.description: AI-powered Jira integration for Slack. Create tickets with /ticket command or mention @starship to analyze conversations and generate tasks.
display_information.long_description:
Starship is an intelligent Slack bot that seamlessly integrates with Jira and leverages OpenAI to streamline your project management workflow.

Key Features:
• Create Jira tickets instantly with the /ticket slash command
• Mention @starship in any thread to have AI analyze the conversation and suggest a Jira task
• Automatic Definition of Done (DoD) generation based on conversation context
• Image analysis support - include screenshots and images for better context
• Easy user assignment with @starship assign to [username]
• Secure OAuth 3.0 integration with Jira

Perfect for development teams who want to capture ideas, bugs, and feature requests directly from their Slack conversations without context switching.
